title: Hajimete no Gal
description: Spring. The 'season of love' has arrived and it seems that finding himself a girlfriend was harder than Jun'ichi believed. To break the status quo, Jun'ichi's friends have forced him into confessing to the gyaru, Yame Yukana. However, things do not go quite as he expected.

altTitles.en: My First Girlfriend is a Gal

altTitles.pt-br: Minha primeira namorada é uma Gal!

altTitles.vi: Cô Bạn Gái Của Tôi Là Một Gyaru
